items.title: BuildShip | Visual Low-code Backend Builder
items.contents:
AI Assistant Builder is here - Create Chatbots on your own data üëâ

Resources

Community

Open App

Build
powerful APIs
in minutes
Low-Code
Visual Backend Builder
Powered by AI

Get started ‚Äî it's free

THE NODEVERSE

Connect pre-built nodes or generate your own

Browse through a large set of ready-made nodes or create one using AI. No more waiting for integrations ‚Äì bring your ideas to life, without code!

Generate with AI

Combine any AI model or tool into your flow

Multimodal flows with LLMs, image and video gen using AI models on OpenAI, Stable Diffusion, HuggingFace, and more.

Flow nodes

Utilities

AI models

Integrations

API Call
Script
Branch
Loop
Return
Switch
Start fast with a Template. 
Remix. Ship.

Everything is possible! Watch as we keep building templates for some of the most complex use cases using popular AI tools.

üìÅ
Assistant with Document Retrieval

Make an Assistant that access to the files you upload in the Assistant playground.

OpenAI

üõãÔ∏è
Chat with GSheets

Make an Assistant that access to a Google Sheets to respond. This template showcases an online furniture store.

OpenAI BuildShip database GSheets

üëÅÔ∏è
Google Vision - Text Detection

Given an image, find the text in it using Google Vision.

Google Vision

üí∞
Stripe Checkout Completed

Trigger a workflow on Stripe payment completion. Extract customer data, update membership, incrementing user credits and more.

Stripe Firebase

üîé
Vector DB Search

Free vector search endpoint to query from a json datastore using OpenAI. Use the endpoint for any vector search apps in your product.

Open AI

üí¨
WhatsApp ChatGPT Bot

General purpose WhatsApp chatbot to respond with ChatGPT generated replies.

WhatsApp OpenAI Twilio

Explore all templates

Friction-Free Serverless APIs that Scale 

Go from idea to a cloud-deployed script in seconds, right from your browser. No code needed. Scale infinitely without unexpected cost.

Built-in Database or Bring your own

Comes with a ready to use Firestore database. Or connect to your own database of Firebase, MongoDB, Supabase, Postgres, MySQL and more. 

Unlimited Cloud Storage

Store files, assets, images for use on your workflow or generated via your workflows. Scalable and cost efficient cloud storage at your disposal. 

Secret Manager

Don't use your API keys directly on your Frontend apps. Securely store and use your workflows and APIs with built in interface Google Cloud's Secret Manager

Scheduled Jobs

Execute tasks on an interval or at specific times during the day - any second.

Use 1M+ NPM packages

You can "import" any NPM package readily or use AI generated code.

Version control

Iterate confidently and with speed. Workflow history is stored and reversible.

Code made accessible with Advanced Dev Tools

Experience the power of a code editor equipped with autocomplete, a lightning-fast debugger similar to localhost, and a secure sandboxing environment.

Build with JS/TS 

Most no-code tools have their own complex formulas, leaving you ‚Äústuck‚Äù while building something meaningful. BuildShip simplifies development with Javascript/Typescript and gives access to its extensive reference materials.

Backed by the best

TESTIMONIALS

Ease of no-code meets the power of low-code

JOIN THE LARGEST LOW-CODE COMMUNITY ON DISCORD

This is absurd ü§Ø I just created a Youtube Video to SEO optimized Blog article converter using @bubble and @BuildShipApp in less than 30 minutes.



Now making a tutorial to show you how to do this too! üî•

JJ Englert

NoCode Educator & AI Expert

BuildShip made it possible to quickly add AI to my workflows and go from an idea to a fully working backend flow. Absolutely love how powerful and scalable this is.

Dani Grant 

Co-founder and CEO, Jam.dev

Love @BuildShipApp üöÄ Create an API / Scheduled Job / Backend task in low-code ... fast and powerful!




Andrew Daniels

Head of Design, Flutterflow 

BuildShip makes building your backend such a breeze! Got an API up and running in under 5 mins. AI powered backend building is such a game changer.

Jos Henson Griƒç 

Founder and CEO, Flexperts

BuildShip is a revolution in new app development for people who already know how to use ChatGPT and GPTüöÄ! 




Build your app's backend without complex code with a visual backend builder powered by AI.

Shunsuke Hayashi

Generative AI Utilization Specialist

See them @BuildShipApp - I am in love with it!



First people to learn it will be valuable in the future soon. 

Don‚Äôt miss this

TheMichael

Product Designer

It's incredible how seamless using BuildShip is for integrating AI models / APIs & making them work together. I enjoyed building + shipping backend workflows with BuildShip, it's super efficient.

Emmaly Wilson 

Info Services Manager, SCJ Alliance

@BuildShipApp blew everyone's head yesterday with their AI tool for building workflows.

Great presentation from 

@HariniLabs with more details and demos üí™

Dani Acosta

AI and Prompt Engineering

Shocked at the speed they build and ship (no pun intended) - fair play @BuildShipApp

Olly from Doja

Co-founder of @doja_ai

Express your love

Build with any AI Model,
Data Source & Tool

Open AI

Claude 3

Azure

How to Build
01

REMIX

Remix any template and plug in your OpenAI, Claude 3 or Azure API key and assistant ID

02

BUILD

Tweak the prompts for your usecase

03

CONNECT

Add your tools and database. AI picks the best for the job and fills values

How to Ship

Use AI Assistant as an API or Chatbot Widget

Ship the Assistant in one click as an API or use the free open source AI Chatbot widget to plug-and-play on any website or app.

Open Source AI Chatbot Widget

Easiest way to create connected AI Assistants

Connecting OpenAI Assistant API with ANY database, tools and services has never been easier. No code needed. 

One click connect and ship

Plug in your OpenAI, Claude 3 or Azure Assistant's ID and start building the logic for your assistant. Ship as an API, chat widget or schedule job.

Secure Integration to your database

Connect to your database on Firestore, Postgres, Supabase, MySQL, PlanetScale, Railway and more. Securely, with authentication checks in place.

Create actions on your favourite tools

Make your Assistant powerful by connecting with any third party tools or APIs. Browse through 100s of ready-made nodes.

Generate your own action nodes 

If any integration is missing, use AI to generate one on the fly.

Bots anywhere!

From WhatsApp bot to Telegram bot - easy create any type of bot with ready made integrations or API.

Plugin Chat Widget to any website

Add the open-source chat widget to any websites. From Webflow, Framer, Wix, Wordpress to apps on FlutterFlow, Webstudio, and even Next.js and React apps.

Start building your
BIGGEST ideas 
in the *simplest* of ways.

For enterprises or users who who want to connect and deploy workflows to your own cloud project

Build and ship workflows directly to your cloud project to get the most cost efficienct and scalable pricing at cloud compute level.

Unlock unlimited storage, executions at cost for up to 5 projects and 10 developers. 

Customize the plan further to cater towards your company's growth with guaranteed support SLAs, premium 1:1 onboarding, and training for your development teams.

$1 per 10GB

Contact us via in app Support form to purchase additional storage space

FAQs

What does workflow execution hours mean and how many workflow executions can you have per hour? *

Workflow execution refer to one run of a workflow i.e. one API call or one function run. Each plan comes with a set number of workflow execution hours and in the paid plans you can add as many additional execution hours you need. When a workflow runs, the time it takes to actually execute is deduced from your hours credit. 




For example with free tier's 3 hours workflow execution credit, if your workflow on average takes 2 seconds to execute, then in the free tier you get:




3 hours in seconds / 2 seconds  = 5400 workflow executions




The number of workflow executions therefore depends on the type of workflow you build and how long it takes for each execution takes to process.




We don‚Äôt count the executions in your monthly package, but rather the time it takes to process each execution.




This results in a highly robust and scalable workflow solution which lets you scale infinitely as your product grows. You can easily add more execution hours in any paid plan if you exceed the available processing time that month.

Project and Users

When you sign up for BuildShip, you get a free project by default. Upgrading your project allows you to unlock paid features as per the tier. The cost is on a per-project basis. You can think of a project similar to a workspace. Thus, the users you invite to a project can only access that project workspace and workflows. Creation of any project beyond the free one requires a subscription to a paid plan.

What is a AI generated node?

You can use any of the pre generated nodes from the node explorer. However, if you want to connect to anything not listed and want to use the help of AI to generate a node for you by simply describing the logic you want to be created, then you can use the AI generated node. 

If you have exhausted your quota of AI generated nodes in paid plans, then you can add-on additional credits for AI nodes.

What are the different support channels for free and paid users?

In the initial beta phase, we will be providing support to all users via in app support form

However, after the beta phase, we will be able to provide support for paid plans only via the in app support forms and for the free plan support will be made available from within the community on Discord and by the team on a best effort basis. No response time guaranteed. Upgrade to paid plans for guaranteed support time.

What is a cold start?

In the free and starter plans, a cold start occurs. This means that if you're making your first API request or a request after a significant break since the last one, the response time will be longer than for immediate, consecutive requests. Keep this in mind when estimating the duration of your workflow run.

How to reach the BuildShip team?

Our preferred method is for you to reach out to us via the Support form on the BuildShip app. Alternatively you can email us at hello@buildship.com

Start building your
BIGGEST ideas 
in the *simplest* of ways.

Get started ‚Äî it's free

FAQs

What does workflow execution hours mean and how many workflow executions can you have per hour? *

Workflow execution refer to one run of a workflow i.e. one API call or one function run. Each plan comes with a set number of workflow execution hours and in the paid plans you can add as many additional execution hours you need. When a workflow runs, the time it takes to actually execute is deduced from your hours credit. 




For example with free tier's 3 hours workflow execution credit, if your workflow on average takes 2 seconds to execute, then in the free tier you get:




3 hours in seconds / 2 seconds  = 5400 workflow executions




The number of workflow executions therefore depends on the type of workflow you build and how long it takes for each execution takes to process.




We don‚Äôt count the executions in your monthly package, but rather the time it takes to process each execution.




This results in a highly robust and scalable workflow solution which lets you scale infinitely as your product grows. You can easily add more execution hours in any paid plan if you exceed the available processing time that month.

Project and Users

When you sign up for BuildShip, you get a free project by default. Upgrading your project allows you to unlock paid features as per the tier. The cost is on a per-project basis. You can think of a project similar to a workspace. Thus, the users you invite to a project can only access that project workspace and workflows. Creation of any project beyond the free one requires a subscription to a paid plan.

What is a AI generated node?

You can use any of the pre generated nodes from the node explorer. However, if you want to connect to anything not listed and want to use the help of AI to generate a node for you by simply describing the logic you want to be created, then you can use the AI generated node. 

If you have exhausted your quota of AI generated nodes in paid plans, then you can add-on additional credits for AI nodes.

What are the different support channels for free and paid users?

In the initial beta phase, we will be providing support to all users via in app support form

However, after the beta phase, we will be able to provide support for paid plans only via the in app support forms and for the free plan support will be made available from within the community on Discord and by the team on a best effort basis. No response time guaranteed. Upgrade to paid plans for guaranteed support time.

What is a cold start?

In the free and starter plans, a cold start occurs. This means that if you're making your first API request or a request after a significant break since the last one, the response time will be longer than for immediate, consecutive requests. Keep this in mind when estimating the duration of your workflow run.

How to reach the BuildShip team?

Our preferred method is for you to reach out to us via the Support form on the BuildShip app. Alternatively you can email us at hello@buildship.com

FAQs

What does workflow execution hours mean and how many workflow executions can you have per hour? *

Workflow execution refer to one run of a workflow i.e. one API call or one function run. Each plan comes with a set number of workflow execution hours and in the paid plans you can add as many additional execution hours you need. When a workflow runs, the time it takes to actually execute is deduced from your hours credit. 




For example with free tier's 3 hours workflow execution credit, if your workflow on average takes 2 seconds to execute, then in the free tier you get:




3 hours in seconds / 2 seconds  = 5400 workflow executions




The number of workflow executions therefore depends on the type of workflow you build and how long it takes for each execution takes to process.




We don‚Äôt count the executions in your monthly package, but rather the time it takes to process each execution.




This results in a highly robust and scalable workflow solution which lets you scale infinitely as your product grows. You can easily add more execution hours in any paid plan if you exceed the available processing time that month.

Project and Users

When you sign up for BuildShip, you get a free project by default. Upgrading your project allows you to unlock paid features as per the tier. The cost is on a per-project basis. You can think of a project similar to a workspace. Thus, the users you invite to a project can only access that project workspace and workflows. Creation of any project beyond the free one requires a subscription to a paid plan.

What is a AI generated node?

You can use any of the pre generated nodes from the node explorer. However, if you want to connect to anything not listed and want to use the help of AI to generate a node for you by simply describing the logic you want to be created, then you can use the AI generated node. 

If you have exhausted your quota of AI generated nodes in paid plans, then you can add-on additional credits for AI nodes.

What are the different support channels for free and paid users?

In the initial beta phase, we will be providing support to all users via in app support form

However, after the beta phase, we will be able to provide support for paid plans only via the in app support forms and for the free plan support will be made available from within the community on Discord and by the team on a best effort basis. No response time guaranteed. Upgrade to paid plans for guaranteed support time.

What is a cold start?

In the free and starter plans, a cold start occurs. This means that if you're making your first API request or a request after a significant break since the last one, the response time will be longer than for immediate, consecutive requests. Keep this in mind when estimating the duration of your workflow run.

How to reach the BuildShip team?

Our preferred method is for you to reach out to us via the Support form on the BuildShip app. Alternatively you can email us at hello@buildship.com
FAQs
FAQs
FAQs
What does workflow execution hours mean and how many workflow executions can you have per hour? *

Workflow execution refer to one run of a workflow i.e. one API call or one function run. Each plan comes with a set number of workflow execution hours and in the paid plans you can add as many additional execution hours you need. When a workflow runs, the time it takes to actually execute is deduced from your hours credit. 




For example with free tier's 3 hours workflow execution credit, if your workflow on average takes 2 seconds to execute, then in the free tier you get:




3 hours in seconds / 2 seconds  = 5400 workflow executions




The number of workflow executions therefore depends on the type of workflow you build and how long it takes for each execution takes to process.




We don‚Äôt count the executions in your monthly package, but rather the time it takes to process each execution.




This results in a highly robust and scalable workflow solution which lets you scale infinitely as your product grows. You can easily add more execution hours in any paid plan if you exceed the available processing time that month.

Welcome to BuildShip

A Low-code Visual Backend Builder, powered by AI ‚ú® Use BuildShip to create:

Scalable APIs
Scheduled tasks / CRON jobs
Backend cloud functions
Database CRUD or event data-triggered functions
WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, AI chatbot

BuildShip integrates with any tools like Stripe, Sengrid, Whatsapp or AI model from OpenAI, Replicate etc or database like Firebase, Supabase, Postgres.

ü™© Best part? If any integration is missing, don't get stuck - use AI to generate your own workflow nodes. BuildShip gives you the best of no-code with the power of low-code. See the 5-minute product walkthrough.



Quick Start

Follow the learning resources below to get a deeper understanding of the platform:

How to build a workflow?
‚Üí
What is a node?
‚Üí
What are workflow triggers?
‚Üí

You can connect your favorite AI models, tools, API services, and backend in minutes. Extend your workflow's capabilities with JavaScript / TypeScript code and 1M+ NPM packages! ü§Ø

BuildShip lets you build scalable backend workflows for the apps you build on any stack. Be it a no-code app builder (FlutterFlow, Webflow, Framer, Adalo, Bubble, BravoStudio ...) or a frontend framework (Next.js, React, Vue ...) - you can build scalable backend tasks for them in minutes. This means you don't need to wrangle or deploy things on the cloud platform, wait for long build cycles of cloud functions, perform DevOps, etc.

No-code friendly but the code of every node is accessible and tweakable in javascript/typescript. Comes with features like instant deployment (no need to wait for long build cycles), version control, multiple projects, copying workflows from one project to another, a large number of templates on popular use cases - WhatsApp Bot, Google Vision, Stripe Payment, and so much more.

‚ú®‚ú® Just Build and Ship, instantly üöÄ

What's inside? üëÄ

Built on top of powerful and scalable Google Cloud Platform (GCP), BuildShip gives you a friction-free serverless development experience. Now you can quickly transform your ideas into cloud-deployed scripts within seconds, without leaving your browser.

BuildShip uses Cloud Run to run your code in a serverless environment. It also supports EventArc-based backend triggers, HTTP and webhook backend triggers, data triggers, and BYOC (Bring Your Own Cloud) compatibility.

Features ü™Ñ
Combine the power of any AI Model

Integrate the leading multimodal AI models and services with your APIs and Workflows like ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL-E 2, and many more.

The Nodeverse

Explore and select from The Nodeverse, our library of pre-built nodes or generate your own using AI. Tweak the nodes to your liking and build your own custom workflows.

Build with JavaScript / TypeScript

Typical low-code, no-code tools use their own complicated formulae process as you start to build anything meaningful. With BuildShip you can build on javascript/typescript - which has a lot of reference materials. So you will not get ‚Äústuck‚Äù üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏è in the tool‚Äôs features and can build without limits.

One-of-a-kind development experience

BuildShip provides you with a powerful code editor with autocomplete, localhost-like speedy debugging experience, and a sandboxing environment. Build serverless scripts fast, right from your browser! ‚ö°Ô∏è Schedule your function calls, save data to the database, connect to any API and use 1M + NPM packages.

Why use BuildShip? üö¢

Faster development: BuildShip makes it easy to build and deploy serverless applications, so you can get your ideas to market faster.

Flexible and Extensible: BuildShip offers the most flexible and powerful platform to build APIs and backend workflows exactly the way you want. You will never be stuck waiting for an integration.

Lower costs: It's serverless, so you only pay for the resources you use. This can save you a lot of money on infrastructure costs. You can build 10x workflows for a whole lot less.

Scalability: BuildShip is scalable. So, you can easily scale your applications as your traffic grows!

GDPR Compliant: You have the option to select your project's location and all your workflows will be deployed to that region, which means your data never leaves your region of choice.

Security: Save your API Keys and Secrets on Google Cloud Secret Manager of your own single-tenant project, so you can be confident that your data is safe.

Templates to start fast: 100s of pre-built integrations, from popular AI models like OpenAI text generation, Vector embedding, Sythesia video gen, image gen using Stable Diffusion, or using any AI model on platforms like Replicate, Hugging Face, etc., or even the ones that will launch in the future!

AI-Generated Nodes: You are not limited to pre-built nodes or the platform. Start from hundreds of pre-built nodes, but if something is missing - don‚Äôt wait for BuildShip to release an integration! Simply ask AI and it generates a custom workflow node just for you.

Custom code: Readily use any API or 1M+ NPM packages: You can use any NPM package in the workflow node or ask Ask AI to use an NPM package and generate a node for you.

Code made accessible - anytime you want: BuildShip is not a black box, you can open the code of any node, and tweak it any way you want. Use powerful developer tools like logging, version control, a code editor equipped with autocomplete, a lightning-fast debugger similar to localhost, and a secure sandboxing environment.

One-click deploy: When ready, hit ‚Äúship‚Äù and get your backend workflow deployed instantly!

Start fast with templates: We have templates featuring chatbots, music generators, reverse image search using Google Vision API, Vector DB search, HTML to PDF converter, and more!

They are the team behind Rowy.io - A popular low-code tool for managing Firestore data and building low-code style on Firebase and Google Cloud. They have a great community already building with low-code and the team has been shipping products fast to help and solve products of the low-code community. The team is part of the first batch of AIGrant.org which has backed top emerging AI companies and their investors include Vercel CEO, execs from Figma, Google, Github, and more.

BuildShip FAQ

The BuildShip FAQ is a collection of useful questions and answers about the project. If you have a question that isn't answered here, please open a discussion.

What is a AI generated node?

With BuildShip you can use our pre-build nodes or create one yourself by simply asking what you want to the node to do. You can learn more about it here

What is the pricing plan?

We are a free tier for you to try out BuildShip and plans to accomodate your needs. You can learn all about pricing here

Welcome to BuildShip

A Low-code Visual Backend Builder, powered by AI ‚ú® Use BuildShip to create:

Scalable APIs
Scheduled tasks / CRON jobs
Backend cloud functions
Database CRUD or event data-triggered functions
WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, AI chatbot

BuildShip integrates with any tools like Stripe, Sengrid, Whatsapp or AI model from OpenAI, Replicate etc or database like Firebase, Supabase, Postgres.

ü™© Best part? If any integration is missing, don't get stuck - use AI to generate your own workflow nodes. BuildShip gives you the best of no-code with the power of low-code. See the 5-minute product walkthrough.



Quick Start

Follow the learning resources below to get a deeper understanding of the platform:

How to build a workflow?
‚Üí
What is a node?
‚Üí
What are workflow triggers?
‚Üí

You can connect your favorite AI models, tools, API services, and backend in minutes. Extend your workflow's capabilities with JavaScript / TypeScript code and 1M+ NPM packages! ü§Ø

BuildShip lets you build scalable backend workflows for the apps you build on any stack. Be it a no-code app builder (FlutterFlow, Webflow, Framer, Adalo, Bubble, BravoStudio ...) or a frontend framework (Next.js, React, Vue ...) - you can build scalable backend tasks for them in minutes. This means you don't need to wrangle or deploy things on the cloud platform, wait for long build cycles of cloud functions, perform DevOps, etc.

No-code friendly but the code of every node is accessible and tweakable in javascript/typescript. Comes with features like instant deployment (no need to wait for long build cycles), version control, multiple projects, copying workflows from one project to another, a large number of templates on popular use cases - WhatsApp Bot, Google Vision, Stripe Payment, and so much more.

‚ú®‚ú® Just Build and Ship, instantly üöÄ

What's inside? üëÄ

Built on top of powerful and scalable Google Cloud Platform (GCP), BuildShip gives you a friction-free serverless development experience. Now you can quickly transform your ideas into cloud-deployed scripts within seconds, without leaving your browser.

BuildShip uses Cloud Run to run your code in a serverless environment. It also supports EventArc-based backend triggers, HTTP and webhook backend triggers, data triggers, and BYOC (Bring Your Own Cloud) compatibility.

Features ü™Ñ
Combine the power of any AI Model

Integrate the leading multimodal AI models and services with your APIs and Workflows like ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL-E 2, and many more.

The Nodeverse

Explore and select from The Nodeverse, our library of pre-built nodes or generate your own using AI. Tweak the nodes to your liking and build your own custom workflows.

Build with JavaScript / TypeScript

Typical low-code, no-code tools use their own complicated formulae process as you start to build anything meaningful. With BuildShip you can build on javascript/typescript - which has a lot of reference materials. So you will not get ‚Äústuck‚Äù üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏è in the tool‚Äôs features and can build without limits.

One-of-a-kind development experience

BuildShip provides you with a powerful code editor with autocomplete, localhost-like speedy debugging experience, and a sandboxing environment. Build serverless scripts fast, right from your browser! ‚ö°Ô∏è Schedule your function calls, save data to the database, connect to any API and use 1M + NPM packages.

Why use BuildShip? üö¢

Faster development: BuildShip makes it easy to build and deploy serverless applications, so you can get your ideas to market faster.

Flexible and Extensible: BuildShip offers the most flexible and powerful platform to build APIs and backend workflows exactly the way you want. You will never be stuck waiting for an integration.

Lower costs: It's serverless, so you only pay for the resources you use. This can save you a lot of money on infrastructure costs. You can build 10x workflows for a whole lot less.

Scalability: BuildShip is scalable. So, you can easily scale your applications as your traffic grows!

GDPR Compliant: You have the option to select your project's location and all your workflows will be deployed to that region, which means your data never leaves your region of choice.

Security: Save your API Keys and Secrets on Google Cloud Secret Manager of your own single-tenant project, so you can be confident that your data is safe.

Templates to start fast: 100s of pre-built integrations, from popular AI models like OpenAI text generation, Vector embedding, Sythesia video gen, image gen using Stable Diffusion, or using any AI model on platforms like Replicate, Hugging Face, etc., or even the ones that will launch in the future!

AI-Generated Nodes: You are not limited to pre-built nodes or the platform. Start from hundreds of pre-built nodes, but if something is missing - don‚Äôt wait for BuildShip to release an integration! Simply ask AI and it generates a custom workflow node just for you.

Custom code: Readily use any API or 1M+ NPM packages: You can use any NPM package in the workflow node or ask Ask AI to use an NPM package and generate a node for you.

Code made accessible - anytime you want: BuildShip is not a black box, you can open the code of any node, and tweak it any way you want. Use powerful developer tools like logging, version control, a code editor equipped with autocomplete, a lightning-fast debugger similar to localhost, and a secure sandboxing environment.

One-click deploy: When ready, hit ‚Äúship‚Äù and get your backend workflow deployed instantly!

Start fast with templates: We have templates featuring chatbots, music generators, reverse image search using Google Vision API, Vector DB search, HTML to PDF converter, and more!

They are the team behind Rowy.io - A popular low-code tool for managing Firestore data and building low-code style on Firebase and Google Cloud. They have a great community already building with low-code and the team has been shipping products fast to help and solve products of the low-code community. The team is part of the first batch of AIGrant.org which has backed top emerging AI companies and their investors include Vercel CEO, execs from Figma, Google, Github, and more.

BuildShip FAQ

The BuildShip FAQ is a collection of useful questions and answers about the project. If you have a question that isn't answered here, please open a discussion.

What is a AI generated node?

With BuildShip you can use our pre-build nodes or create one yourself by simply asking what you want to the node to do. You can learn more about it here

What is the pricing plan?

We are a free tier for you to try out BuildShip and plans to accomodate your needs. You can learn all about pricing here
(opens in a new tab)
.

Faster development: BuildShip makes it easy to build and deploy serverless applications, so you can get your ideas to market faster.

Flexible and Extensible: BuildShip offers the most flexible and powerful platform to build APIs and backend workflows exactly the way you want. You will never be stuck waiting for an integration.

Lower costs: It's serverless, so you only pay for the resources you use. This can save you a lot of money on infrastructure costs. You can build 10x workflows for a whole lot less.

Scalability: BuildShip is scalable. So, you can easily scale your applications as your traffic grows!

GDPR Compliant: You have the option to select your project's location and all your workflows will be deployed to that region, which means your data never leaves your region of choice.

Security: Save your API Keys and Secrets on Google Cloud Secret Manager of your own single-tenant project, so you can be confident that your data is safe.

Templates to start fast: 100s of pre-built integrations, from popular AI models like OpenAI text generation, Vector embedding, Sythesia video gen, image gen using Stable Diffusion, or using any AI model on platforms like Replicate, Hugging Face, etc., or even the ones that will launch in the future!

AI-Generated Nodes: You are not limited to pre-built nodes or the platform. Start from hundreds of pre-built nodes, but if something is missing - don‚Äôt wait for BuildShip to release an integration! Simply ask AI and it generates a custom workflow node just for you.

Custom code: Readily use any API or 1M+ NPM packages: You can use any NPM package in the workflow node or ask Ask AI to use an NPM package and generate a node for you.

Code made accessible - anytime you want: BuildShip is not a black box, you can open the code of any node, and tweak it any way you want. Use powerful developer tools like logging, version control, a code editor equipped with autocomplete, a lightning-fast debugger similar to localhost, and a secure sandboxing environment.

One-click deploy: When ready, hit ‚Äúship‚Äù and get your backend workflow deployed instantly!

Start fast with templates: We have templates featuring chatbots, music generators, reverse image search using Google Vision API, Vector DB search, HTML to PDF converter, and more!

They are the team behind Rowy.io - A popular low-code tool for managing Firestore data and building low-code style on Firebase and Google Cloud. They have a great community already building with low-code and the team has been shipping products fast to help and solve products of the low-code community. The team is part of the first batch of AIGrant.org which has backed top emerging AI companies and their investors include Vercel CEO, execs from Figma, Google, Github, and more.

BuildShip FAQ

The BuildShip FAQ is a collection of useful questions and answers about the project. If you have a question that isn't answered here, please open a discussion.

What is a AI generated node?

With BuildShip you can use our pre-build nodes or create one yourself by simply asking what you want to the node to do. You can learn more about it here

What is the pricing plan?

We are a free tier for you to try out BuildShip and plans to accomodate your needs. You can learn all about pricing here
(opens in a new tab)
.

ü™© Best part? If any integration is missing, don't get stuck - use AI to generate your own workflow nodes. BuildShip gives you the best of no-code with the power of low-code. See the 5-minute product walkthrough.
Best part?

You can connect your favorite AI models, tools, API services, and backend in minutes. Extend your workflow's capabilities with JavaScript / TypeScript code and 1M+ NPM packages! ü§Ø
BuildShip lets you build scalable backend workflows for the apps you build on any stack. Be it a no-code app builder (FlutterFlow, Webflow, Framer, Adalo, Bubble, BravoStudio ...) or a frontend framework (Next.js, React, Vue ...) - you can build scalable backend tasks for them in minutes. This means you don't need to wrangle or deploy things on the cloud platform, wait for long build cycles of cloud functions, perform DevOps, etc.
No-code friendly but the code of every node is accessible and tweakable in javascript/typescript. Comes with features like instant deployment (no need to wait for long build cycles), version control, multiple projects, copying workflows from one project to another, a large number of templates on popular use cases - WhatsApp Bot, Google Vision, Stripe Payment, and so much more.
‚ú®‚ú® Just Build and Ship, instantly üöÄ
What's inside? üëÄ
Built on top of powerful and scalable Google Cloud Platform (GCP), BuildShip gives you a friction-free serverless development experience. Now you can quickly transform your ideas into cloud-deployed scripts within seconds, without leaving your browser.
Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
BuildShip uses Cloud Run to run your code in a serverless environment. It also supports EventArc-based backend triggers, HTTP and webhook backend triggers, data triggers, and BYOC (Bring Your Own Cloud) compatibility.
Cloud Run
Features ü™Ñ
Combine the power of any AI Model
Integrate the leading multimodal AI models and services with your APIs and Workflows like ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL-E 2, and many more.
ChatGPT
Stable Diffusion
Midjourney
DALL-E 2
The Nodeverse
Explore and select from The Nodeverse, our library of pre-built nodes or generate your own using AI. Tweak the nodes to your liking and build your own custom workflows.
Build with JavaScript / TypeScript
Typical low-code, no-code tools use their own complicated formulae process as you start to build anything meaningful. With BuildShip you can build on javascript/typescript - which has a lot of reference materials. So you will not get ‚Äústuck‚Äù üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏è in the tool‚Äôs features and can build without limits.
stuck

Assistant with Document Retrieval

Make an Assistant that access to the files you upload in the Assistant playground.

Remix

Chat to try

How to use

Use the Remix button on top to clone this template




Setup an account on BuildShip by following the steps




Add your Open API key and your Assistant ID to the secret manager 




Test by providing some sample input values to your workflow




You can also check the logs for the logic flow




Finally, when you are happy with the testing, click Ship üöÄ to deploy the workflow as an API, scheduled job or other trigger.

You can follow our documentation to learn more on document retrieval from OpenAI

Have any questions, need help? Use the in app support or join the our community discussion on our Discord.

Templates

Chat with GSheets

Make an Assistant that access to a Google Sheets to respond. This template showcases an online furniture store.

Remix

Chat to try

How to use

As an example, you can check our sample database. It simulates the products from an online store Azure Home that specializes in eco-friendly furniture

Setup an account on BuildShip




Create a workflow by cloning this template




Add your Open API key and your Assistant ID to the secret manager




Auth with Google within the ‚ÄòGet sheet‚Äô node 




Finally, click Ship üöÄ to deploy the workflow

Follow our documentation to learn more on how you can to give access to a Google spreadsheet to your assistant using the Get Sheets node.

Create a workflow by cloning the Google Vision: Text Detection template




Add the required API keys to the secret manager




Finally, click Ship üöÄ to deploy the workflow

Contact Us
Stable Diffusion 3

Stable Diffusion 3, our most advanced image model yet, features the latest in text-to-image technology with greatly improved performance in multi-subject prompts, image quality, and spelling abilities. 

The model is available via API today and we are continuously working to improve the model in advance of its open release. To learn more about deployment options please contact us.

Get Started with API
Contact Us
Stable Diffusion XL

Get involved with the fastest growing open software project. Download and join other developers in creating incredible applications with Stable Diffusion XL as a foundation model.

Get Started with API
Download Code
SDXL Turbo

Discover the groundbreaking SDXL Turbo, the latest advancement from our research team. Built on the robust foundation of Stable Diffusion XL, this ultra-fast model transforms the way you interact with technology.

Read the Research Paper

Get Membership
Download Code
Open, unbiased, and ready for the world

The next step in our mission to democratize AI and building a global foundation to activate humanity‚Äôs potential is to make our models as unbiased as possible. The introduction of our Japanese models is a clear step in that direction.

Japanese Stable Diffusion XL

A text-to-image model that emphasizes Japanese input to better understand Japanese culture. It comprehends Japanese expressions better than traditional English models, allowing for high-quality image generation that feels native.

Download Code
Learn More

Get Membership
Japanese Stable VLM

Equipped with image captioning capabilities, this advanced Japanese image-language model can generate detailed Japanese descriptions for any image.

Learn More
Japanese Stable Clip

A feature extraction model for zero-shot image classification and image search. Capable of classifying images without prior class information learning, it can also search for images based on any text.

Download Code
Learn More

Get Membership
Build with a Stability AI¬†Membership

The Stability AI Membership offers flexibility for your generative AI needs by combining our range of state-of-the-art open models with self-hosting benefits.

Get Membership

Stable Diffusion 3

Stable Diffusion 3, our most advanced image model yet, features the latest in text-to-image technology with greatly improved performance in multi-subject prompts, image quality, and spelling abilities. 

The model is available via API today and we are continuously working to improve the model in advance of its open release. To learn more about deployment options please contact us.

Open, unbiased, and ready for the world

The next step in our mission to democratize AI and building a global foundation to activate humanity‚Äôs potential is to make our models as unbiased as possible. The introduction of our Japanese models is a clear step in that direction.

Japanese Stable Diffusion XL

A text-to-image model that emphasizes Japanese input to better understand Japanese culture. It comprehends Japanese expressions better than traditional English models, allowing for high-quality image generation that feels native.

Download Code
Learn More

Get Membership
Japanese Stable VLM

Equipped with image captioning capabilities, this advanced Japanese image-language model can generate detailed Japanese descriptions for any image.

Learn More
Japanese Stable Clip

A feature extraction model for zero-shot image classification and image search. Capable of classifying images without prior class information learning, it can also search for images based on any text.

Download Code
Learn More
